verses.verse: Do any of you who have an item facing the different brother dare to be judged before the people who do what is wrong and not before the sacred people?
Don't you realize that the sacred people will judge the world? And if the world is judged among you, are you undeserving of the smallest courts?
Don't you realize that we will judge angels? We can definitely judge this life's things, can we not?
So if you certainly have courts for this life's things, seat these people as judges: the people who have been treated as nobodies in the assembly.
Toward embarrassment to you, I say it like this: Isn't there an insightful person among you, or even one person who will be able to consider what is wrong up in the middle of his brother?
But a brother with a brother is judged, even this, before untrusting people.
So it certainly already is a defeat among you entirely, because you have judgments with yourselves. Why not instead be wronged? Why not instead be robbed?
But you wrong and rob even these: brothers.

Or don't you realize that people who do what is wrong won't inherit God's empire. Don't be misled. Neither people who commit sexual sin, nor idol worshippers, nor cheating spouses, nor elegant people, nor homosexuals,
nor thieves, nor people who desire more, nor alcoholics, no people who put others down, no vicious people will inherit God's empire.
And some of you were these things, but you doused yourselves off, but you were made sacred, but you were made right in the name of the Master Jesus and in the Spirit of our God.
Everything is permitted to me, but not everything is advantageous. Everything is permitted to me, but I won't be controlled by anything.
The foods are for the belly, and the belly is for the foods, but God will make both this belly and these foods useless. The body is not for sexual sin, but for the Master and the Master for the body.
God both got the Master up and will get us up out of here through His ability.
Don't you realize that your bodies are body parts of the Anointed King? So after taking the body parts of the Anointed King, will I make them body parts of a prostitute? It could not happen.
Or don't you realize that the person being stuck like glue to the prostitute is one body? You see, "The two," He declares, "will be in one physical body."
The person being stuck like glue to the Master is one spirit.
Escape the sexual sin. Every sin that a person might ever do is outside of the body, but the person who commits sexual sin sins into his own body.
Or don't you realize that your body is a temple of the Sacred Spirit in you, that you have out from God and you are not your own?
You see, you were bought with something of value. Make God magnificent, for sure, in your body and in your spirit, some that are God's.
